game.name: Medieval Dynasty
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 척박한 중세 시대에서 사냥하고, 살아남고, 건축하고, 지도자가 되어 보세요. 나만의 중세 왕조를 만들어 오래 지속될 번영을 지켜내거나, 노력하다 죽음을 맞이하세요! 혼자 플레이하거나 친구들과 팀을 이루어 궁극의 중세 경험을 즐기세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hunt, survive, build and lead in the harsh Middle Ages: Create your own Medieval Dynasty and ensure its long-lasting prosperity or die trying! Play alone or team up with friends to enjoy the ultimate medieval experience.

reviewHighlights.text: Marginally decent city builder game, cozy vibe. Would NOT recommend because of lack of meaningfull improvements (some) and wrong direction of the dev...
TLDR: The problem with this game is: a. early game is basically a very good first person survival/base building game b. then it turns in mid/late game...
